thread.title: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 5
thread.title_full: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 5

author: Justin Soderberg
title: Former River Hawk Games of the Week: October 5
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
The UMass Lowell River Hawks have 16 former student athletes playing professional hockey in the National Hockey League (NHL), American Hockey League (AHL) or ECHL this coming season. 
Each week we will give you our picks for the “Former River Hawk Games of the Week,” likely one for each league, however, if we see fit that there are no games of the week SHARE
